Actions.Name: Hypnogogia
Actions.Description: A character in range of the [name] becomes pacified. If already pacified, the character becomes unable to dash, fly, or teleport until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Frenzied Song
Actions.Description: Allies in range of the [name] can dash 1 and immediately save against all statuses.

Actions.Name: Song of Deadly Soothing
Actions.Description: All foes in range of the [name] must save or become shoved as far as possible towards the [name] and pacified, or just shoved 1 towards it on a successful save.
